**What happened?**\
Describe the issue in one or two sentences.

**How do we trigger it?**\
Write the quickest path to reproduce. Even something short like "Open the editor, do X, then it breaks" is fine.

**What did you expect instead?**\
Tell us what you thought should happen.

**Any logs or screenshots?**\
Drop in anything that helps. Logs, callstacks, screenshots, short clips --- whatever you have.

**Anything else?**\
Add extra notes if you think they will help.
